## sys.path

```{python}
import sys
type(sys.path)
len(sys.path)
sys.path[0]
sys.path[1]
```

### sys.path.append

Append at the end of the current path.

```{python, cache=FALSE}
import sys
sys.path.append('path1')
len(sys.path)
sys.path[-1]
```

### sys.path.extend

Similar to append

```{python, cache=FALSE}
import sys
sys.path.extend(['path2'])
len(sys.path)
sys.path[-2:]
```

### sys.path.insert

Insert anywhere into the current path.

```{python, cache=FALSE}
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, 'path3')
len(sys.path)
sys.path[0]
```
